name: Cyber Blade: Action Platformer
description:
Cyber Blade is an adrenaline-pumping cyberpunk action game with a pixelated twist!

Destroy your enemies to the beat of stylish music, dodging traps and lasers!

Master the art of quick jumping to avoid falling into spikey traps!


Run from deadly bosses destroying everything on their way!


Break into guarded hideouts, eliminate the enemies and collect rare artifacts!


Collect shurikens on your way to attack your enemies from distance!


Jump on walls to get to hard to reach secret locations!


Are you ready to immerse yourself in a pixelated cyberpunk world with dangerous opponents and a dystopian future civilization?
Welcome to Cyber Blade! Fans of classic platformers and runners worldwide surely won’t be disappointed by joining this game - a vast cyberpunk world,
full of brutal battles for survival and freedom!

Key Features:

  • Experience the driving gameplay of Hotline Miami
  • Simple two-button controls
  • Aggressive music for quick kills
  • Enjoy the incredible pixel graphics of the cyberpunk world
  • Improve your skills and reaction, fight and progress through new levels
